thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: Arthur
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Arthur

author: Arthur
title: Arthur
text: Really happy with the whole rental experience. Easy pickup straight from our arrival at the airport. Friendly, clear communication at the desk. The vehicle we rented (Kia Carnival) was awesome. Easy drop off to airport. No hassles at all. We'll go through the same Redspot next time. Highly recommend.
